languages.text: "Не нравится мне этот интерес Лорд-капитана к госпоже Хейдари. Она полезна, но подпускать ее столь близко неосмотрительно".
"I do not like the Lord Captain's interest in Mistress Heydari. She is useful, but letting her get so close is imprudent."
languages.original_text: "Не нравится мне этот интерес Лорд-капитана к госпоже Хейдари. Она полезна, но подпускать ее столь близко неосмотрительно".

traits.locale_text: "I do not like the Lord Captain's interest in Mistress Heydari. She is useful, but letting her get so close is imprudent."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我不赞赏舰长大人对海达利小姐的兴趣。她固然作用很大，但与她如此亲密，实在是不合时宜。”
languages.original_text: "I do not like the Lord Captain's interest in Mistress Heydari. She is useful, but letting her get so close is imprudent."

traits.locale_text: “我不赞赏舰长大人对海达利小姐的兴趣。她固然作用很大，但与她如此亲密，实在是不合时宜。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je dois dire que je n'approuve pas l'intérêt que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} porte à maîtresse Heydari. Elle est utile, certes, mais une telle proximité relève de l'imprudence. »
languages.original_text: "I do not like the Lord Captain's interest in Mistress Heydari. She is useful, but letting her get so close is imprudent."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois dire que je n'approuve pas l'intérêt que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} porte à maîtresse Heydari. Elle est utile, certes, mais une telle proximité relève de l'imprudence. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «No me gusta el interés que muestra {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán por la maestra Heydari. Es útil, pero es imprudente dejar que se acerque tanto».
languages.original_text: "I do not like the Lord Captain's interest in Mistress Heydari. She is useful, but letting her get so close is imprudent."

traits.locale_text: «No me gusta el interés que muestra {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán por la maestra Heydari. Es útil, pero es imprudente dejar que se acerque tanto».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンがヘイダリ嬢に興味を持つのは気に入らない。彼女は有用ですが、あそこまで接近させるのは軽率です」
languages.original_text: "I do not like the Lord Captain's interest in Mistress Heydari. She is useful, but letting her get so close is imprudent."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンがヘイダリ嬢に興味を持つのは気に入らない。彼女は有用ですが、あそこまで接近させるのは軽率です」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Mir gefällt es nicht, dass der Lord Captain Interesse an Herrin Heydari zeigt. Sie ist nützlich, doch sie so nah an sich heranzulassen, ist unklug."
languages.original_text: "I do not like the Lord Captain's interest in Mistress Heydari. She is useful, but letting her get so close is imprudent."

traits.locale_text: "Mir gefällt es nicht, dass der Lord Captain Interesse an Herrin Heydari zeigt. Sie ist nützlich, doch sie so nah an sich heranzulassen, ist unklug."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I do not like the Lord Captain's interest in Mistress Heydari. She is useful, but letting her get so close is imprudent."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan'ın Üstat Heydari'ye olan ilgisini tasvip etmiyorum. Üstat faydalı olabilir ama yakınlığın bu kadarı da ahlaksızlık."
languages.original_text: "I do not like the Lord Captain's interest in Mistress Heydari. She is useful, but letting her get so close is imprudent."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan'ın Heydari Hanım'a olan ilgisini tasvip etmiyorum. Faydalı biri ama yakınlığın bu kadarı da ahlaksızlık."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
